title: The list price of a table fan is Rs 480 and it is available to a retailer at a 25% discount. For how much should a retailer sell it to gain 15%? - Quora

response.answer_text: Friends…! The list price of a table fan is Rs 480 and it is available to a retailer at a 25% discount 25% discount on ₹480 = 25/100 × 480 =₹120 Thus Retailer purchase price = ₹480 - ₹120 = ₹360 how much should a retailer sell it to gain 15% 15% of ₹360 =15/100 × ₹360 = 15 × 360 /100 = 5400/100 ₹54 To gain ₹54 the sale price of fan by retailer will be = ₹360 + ₹54 = ₹414 The retailer has to sale the fan at price of ₹ 414 to gain 15% Answer : The retailer has to sale the fan at price of ₹ 414 to gain 15%
